alert.note: Alert for Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 4:50PM CDT until April 19 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 450 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Norge, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Tuttle, Dibble, Cole, Amber, Bridge Creek, Norge, Middleberg, Tabler, Ninnekah, and Laverty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
